  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gameGrid) throws java.lang.Exception
      This Method initializes the music, debug, Stage and GameGrid, and then load the default game file, finally update level and movesCount
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the stage of the game
      gameGrid - the grids of the map
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - because loadDefaultSaveFile may throw the exception

      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the stage of the game
      gameGrid - the grids of the map

      java.lang.Exception - because loadDefaultSaveFile may throw the exception

    • handleKey

      public boolean handleKey​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code) throws java.lang.Exception
      This Method detects the click of the keyboard
      Parameters:
      code - the code from keyboard
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicates the keeper has moved or not
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - because undo may throw exception UP/W: move up, and save back key for undo DOWN/S: move down, and save back key for undo RIGHT/D: move right, and save back key for undo LEFT/A: move left, and save back key for undo B: undo FastKey E: exit FastKey M: music FastKey

    • level_step_fresh

      public void level_step_fresh()
      This Method updates: level steps (movesCount) power in the menu bar

    • undoFresh

      public void undoFresh()
      This Method change the status of undo true -> false; false -> true

    • resetFresh

      public void resetFresh()
      This Method change the status of reset true -> false; false -> true

      This Method load the default saved file ("SampleGame.skb")
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the stage of the game
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - because initializeGame may throw exception

    • loadDefaultDebugFile

      void loadDefaultDebugFile​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws java.lang.Exception

    • initializeGame

      private void initializeGame​(java.io.InputStream input, boolean production) throws java.lang.Exception
      This Method initializes a game
      Parameters:
      input - The inputStream of the file
      production - a boolean value, if true, the currentLevel in gameEngine needs to getNextLevel
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • setEventFilter

      private void setEventFilter()
      This Method detects the input from the keyboard, and passes it into the method handleKey() as a parameter, finally try to reloadGrid

    • loadGameFile

      private void loadGameFile() throws java.lang.Exception
      This Method load a selected game file, get the input stream and passes it to initializeGame() as a parameter
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - because initializeGame may throw exception

    • saveGameFile

      private void saveGameFile() throws java.io.IOException
      This Method saves a game file, The basic idea is to get the correct format of information in each level, includes MapSetName, movesCount, CurrentLevel (index), map of each level
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - it is related to read/write file

    • reloadGrid

      private void reloadGrid() throws java.lang.Exception
      This Method basically reload the map, if game is completed, then it stops playing the music and goes back to the GameStart scene
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - because rankingUpdate and showWindow may throw the exception

    • getRankingCount

      private int getRankingCount() throws java.io.IOException
      This Method gets the total number of records in ranking set
      Returns:
      the total number of records in ranking set
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - FileInputStream

    • setRankingCount

      private void setRankingCount​(int count) throws java.io.IOException
      This Method sets the total number of records in ranking set
      Parameters:
      count - the total number of records in ranking set
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - FileInputStream

    • rankingUpdate

      private void rankingUpdate() throws java.io.IOException
      This Method updates the ranking, write a file with the information of id, mapSetName, and movesCount
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - because setRankingCount may throw exception

    • showVictoryMessage

      private void showVictoryMessage()
      This Method shows a dialog of victory, you can see the MapSetName and the final moves count

      private void newDialog​(java.lang.String dialogTitle, java.lang.String dialogMessage, javafx.scene.effect.Effect dialogMessageEffect)
      This Method defines a style of a dialog
      Parameters:
      dialogTitle - The title of the dialog
      dialogMessage - The message of the dialog
      dialogMessageEffect - The style of the dialog

    • addObjectToGrid

      private void addObjectToGrid​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point location, int mode)
      This Method add a gameObject to the gameGrid
      Parameters:
      gameObject - the instance of GameObject
      location - the location of the gameObject
      mode - 0 -> Plant Mode, 1 -> Zombie Mode
